thread.title: Jordan's king tells Pence U.S. must rebuild trust after Jerusalem decision

title: Jordan's king tells Pence U.S. must rebuild trust after Jerusalem decision
text:
Jordan's king tells Pence U.S. must rebuild trust after Jerusalem decision Sunday, January 21, 2018 - 01:24 
Jordan's King Abdullah told U.S. Vice President Mike Pence on Sunday he looked to Washington to rebuild ''trust and confidence'' in moving toward a two-state solution in Israel after President Donald Trump recognized Jerusalem as the country's capital. Rough Cut (no reporter narration).   
Jordan's King Abdullah told U.S. Vice President Mike Pence on Sunday he looked to Washington to rebuild "trust and confidence" in moving toward a two-state solution in Israel after President Donald Trump recognized Jerusalem as the country's capital. Rough Cut (no reporter narration).  //reut.rs/2DuWOcl
